item.title: Minister questions why Tate brothers were allowed to leave Romania
item.description: The brothers face rape and human trafficking charges, which they deny.

item.title: Watch: Demolition takes down record-breaking rollercoaster
item.description: Once the world's tallest rollercoaster, Kingda Ka was demolished at Six Flags in New Jersey.

item.title: Dozens missing in Indian Himalayas avalanche
item.description: At least 25 people are still missing in a remote part of the country's north.

item.title: Ten things Trump and his team did this week
item.description: President Trump continues to play global disruptor while the world does its best to engage with him.

item.title: Dozens arrested in global hit against AI-generated child abuse
item.description: At least 25 people were detained during a worldwide operation, Europol says.
